legacy.description: This is the official page of Anji, a beautiful county in Huzhou, Zhejiang. Follow us for updates on our scenic landscapes, vibrant culture & latest development.
legacy.name: Anji of China

result.text: Today marks China's inaugural #NationalEcologyDay! It is celebrated on Aug 15 in honor of the concept that "lucid waters and lush mountains are invaluable assets", which was thought up on the same day 18 years ago in Yucun village, #Anji. Yucun now stands as a shining example of green living and sustainable progress. #GreenAnji

Clear waters and lush mountains are invaluable assets. #China's 1st National #EcologyDay, Aug 15, a decade of strides:
🌍Leading global green growth
🌬PM2.5 ↓ 57%, pollution days ↓ 92%
🐾80%+ protected species in national parks
🌿Combating #climatechange, China in action! https://t.co/AIqQN68WwE
